package org.dbpedia.extraction.wikiparser.impl.wikipedia

import org.dbpedia.extraction.util.Language

/**
 * Holds the category redirect identifiers of the different Wikipedia languages. Do not edit CategoryRedirect.scala!
 * GenerateWikiSettings.scala uses the template file CategoryRedirect.scala.txt to generate CategoryRedirect.scala.
 */
object CategoryRedirect
{
    private val map : Map[String, Set[String]] =
// @ insert categoryRedirects here @ //

// @ insert errors here @ //

    def apply(language : Language): Set[String] = map(language.wikiCode)

    def get(language : Language) : Option[Set[String]] = map.get(language.wikiCode)
}
